episode_summary: This episode covers a range of quirky and intriguing topics, including the hiring of 'mistress dispellers' in China, Richard Nixon's preference for a higher chair, the policing of the Paris catacombs, and the surprising popularity of buying CDs at KFC in Indonesia.

facts.fact: In China, you can hire mistress dispellers to lure away your husband's mistress.
Richard Nixon's chair was 2.5 inches higher than everyone else's in the cabinet room.
There is a special police unit in France whose job is to monitor six million dead people.
The number one place to buy CDs in Indonesia now is KFC.
